name: Easy Meatballs
author: Love2Cook
summary: My husband makes these easy meatballs with simple ingredients like eggs, panko bread crumbs, garlic powder, and fresh basil, and they come out flavorful and delicious every time! Kids love them too! If desired, add the cooked meatballs to your favorite sauce until submerged (this brings out the moistness).
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Mix eggs, Italian seasoning, basil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder together in a large bowl
Add beef and panko bread crumbs and mix thoroughly
Shape mixture into about forty 1 1/2-inch balls, a little smaller than golf balls, using a teaspoon
Place on ungreased, rimmed baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the centers, turning halfway through cooking time, 10 to 15 minutes total
